{"games":[{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1168780,"totalDownVotes":124993,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":449728,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
We are a small two person Dev team working hard to make Brookhaven the best it can be.
Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4258821,"totalDownVotes":779654,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":265495,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👪입양으로 가족을 만들고 나만의 집도 꾸미고, 입양섬을 탐험하세요! 👪 

제작자를 소개합니다! 
NewFissy - 기술 담당(https://twitter.com/newfissy)

문제를 발견했나요? 건의 사항이 있나요? 트위터에서 DM을 보내주세요: https://twitter.com/TeamAdoptMe 

🔔🔔🔔 새 업데이트가 출시되면 알림을 받을 수 있도록 팔로우 버튼을 누르는 것 잊지 마세요! 🔔🔔🔔 

게임 크레딧: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/adopt-me-credits/71812"},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3797543,"totalDownVotes":313222,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":95118,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!"},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":628339,"totalDownVotes":47811,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":87293,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":917260,"totalDownVotes":58100,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[UPDATE 50 + 2x EXP] Shindo","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":52663,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"UPDATE 50:

(Additional respective mod author credits can be found in-game)"},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":536270,"totalDownVotes":37603,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":48918,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies
⚡Each Unit has Unique Cool Abilities

⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles
🌀Team up with your friends to take on story mode or the infinity tower
🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour
Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🐦Creators: Benoxa, FruitySama, JokeTheFool

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu "},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2796995,"totalDownVotes":365777,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":41493,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

"},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2081447,"totalDownVotes":287892,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🌼High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":58614,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌼New Update 5/3! Check the in-game update log in new servers (the book with the !) for full details!

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡

icon by @ixchoco_!"},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":296019,"totalDownVotes":33186,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"『New STAND』 Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":27159,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and much more! Please read the help section in the game's loading screen.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK DOWN BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

This game was created by UzuKee with the help in development from the Bizarre Studios team.

Disclaimers:
The game contains flashy lights and imagery that may cause discomfort or seizures to those with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. In VIP servers, Item spawning is x1.3 more rare and long. You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!"},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1431818,"totalDownVotes":119839,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":48636,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"¡Construye tu barco y zarpa hacia la aventura!

Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":34711,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The latest Jailbreak update is here!

⚽️ New Soccer Ball reward: Bonded Wheels!
🎉 5B Visits Garage Spoiler! TY for getting us here!! ❤️
Next update: An all new robbery!!


🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over four billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089"},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3243994,"totalDownVotes":284916,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":54603,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. And join our Roblox group/community!"},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2155703,"totalDownVotes":662817,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":71405,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?

Sorry for anyone unable to use Shift-Lock due to Roblox binding chat to Shift+7 on some keyboards. This is a Roblox issue we are unable to fix"},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1026950,"totalDownVotes":51743,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"SEASON 4💥 Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":27986,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

Builder: @BIack_Smith
Modeler: @Mirror_RBX"},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":149582,"totalDownVotes":8139,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[🔥UPDATE 3🐣]Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":14461,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure game. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1194052,"totalDownVotes":68035,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":21048,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592"},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":702169,"totalDownVotes":94784,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🦌 [DESERT BOSS!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":19740,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":520773,"totalDownVotes":42603,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":18680,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Metaverse update will come out today, please wait a bit

In this world, no one can survive alone. Team up with friends to fend off countless waves of zombies, fight bosses, earn coins, level up, and buy new towers! If you're feeling up for a challenge, try taking on harder bosses on harder difficulties!

👥💵 Join the group for +$100 starting cash! https://www.roblox.com/groups/4914494
👍Thumbs up and favorite for more quality updates!🌟

🔨UPDATES🔨
+ 🎃 HALLOWEEN PART 2

+ 🛠️ BUG FIXES + CHANGES

🏆 8th Annual Bloxy Award Winner
Google "TDS Wiki" to visit our for in-depth game info!"},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":234403,"totalDownVotes":20852,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[ DRAGON 🐉 ] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":25721,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Level Cap: 3100

- Fruits spawn in the map every 30 Minutes
- First Time you join game you have 0.1% to get free Conqueror Ability"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":664936,"totalDownVotes":128824,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":10113,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Forma parte en un duelo por equipos 5v5 con una inmensa cantidad de armas y mapas alrededor de todo el
mundo.

Consigue creditos dentro del juego mediante eliminaciones y completando objetivos. Luego utiliza estos 
creditos para comprar nuevas armas, utilidad y granadas al principio de cada ronda."},{"creatorId":21823494,"creatorName":"MiniToon","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2335553,"totalDownVotes":245392,"universeId":1516533665,"name":"Piggy [BOOK 2] CHAPTER 7!","placeId":4623386862,"playerCount":45106,"imageToken":"T_4623386862_d990","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Do you have what it takes to escape Piggy and uncover the mysteries surrounding the beast?

Controls:
Pick up items / Use items - Click (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or Right Trigger (Controller)
Crouch / Place trap - CTRL (Computer), Tap (Mobile) or B (Controller)

Credits:
IK3As - Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 9, Chapter 11 Builder, Additional Chapter 8 Building, Book 2 Chapter 2 and 5 Building
Optikk - Build Mode
TenuousFlea - 'Billy' Model, 'Kraxicorde' Model
For You to Stay © 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":3735330,"creatorName":"Dogs Studios: South","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":190827,"totalDownVotes":31265,"universeId":578392296,"name":"[ BLEACH ] Anime Battle Arena ","placeId":1458767429,"playerCount":9861,"imageToken":"T_1458767429_6114","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Check the second page of the roster to see JoJo characters.
 
Controls:
Shift: Sprint
Q: Dodge
F: Block
Basic Attack: Mouse1
Space+Mouse1: Aerial Attack
Combine Basic Attacks and Aerial Attacks to discover new combos.
Use 1,2,3,4 for your character special moves.
Transformation: G

Developers:  Melon_Sensei, Chicken_Man, Snakeworl
Contributors: BIGPAPAMAUI, Sprano, K1LLUA, Nilvaat, jjjakey, Kogrin, rikaid, Estheking"},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1801344,"totalDownVotes":140684,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":8820,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":275187,"totalDownVotes":144179,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":15777,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":3250407,"creatorName":"Block Evolution Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":243716,"totalDownVotes":25008,"universeId":1230230722,"name":"✨LIL ROBOTS! Club Roblox","placeId":3457390032,"playerCount":31475,"imageToken":"T_3457390032_bedf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨ LITTLE ROBOTS UPDATE!

Club Roblox is a world of possibilities! 👶 Adopt a baby 🏠 Build a home 🐶 Adopt a pet 🎳 Play loads of mini-games and 🎫 Take part in weekly events!
----------------------------------------------------------------

Please give a Thumbs Up & Favourite!

---------------------------------------------------------------- 
Developed by Block Evolution Studios ©
"},{"creatorId":7284047,"creatorName":"Wrongful Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":20192,"totalDownVotes":5440,"universeId":2411591707,"name":"[DEMON + 5X STATS] A Hero's Destiny","placeId":6461766546,"playerCount":11082,"imageToken":"T_6461766546_8638","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Train with friends, battle difficult enemies, and complete challenging quests while working your way towards becoming the strongest! 

Changelog
- Three new bosses
- New class
- Two new relics
- Max rebirth raised to 15
- G.O.D. class buffed
- Bug fixes

Controls
Z - Train
X - Lockon
N - Equip Sword (Ninja)
Q/E/R/F/C - Abilities
G - Awakening
CTRL - Sprint"},{"creatorId":7083660,"creatorName":"StealthWhale","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":55202,"totalDownVotes":5413,"universeId":2383988292,"name":"[WORLD 19] 🐝 Beeface: Be a Bee!","placeId":6410967163,"playerCount":28407,"imageToken":"T_6410967163_718b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"📢 WORLD 20 AT 75K LIKES!
📢 UPDATE: WORLD 19 is here with some surprises, plots now have different shapes! Have a great weekend everyone!

👍 LIKE IF YOU WANT MORE UPDATES!

FEATURES:
